title: Natchez Trace Parkway: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park         The Gordon House at milepost 407.7 is one of two remaining structures left standing on the parkway from the Old Trace era. NPS / D. McClintock  From American Indian mounds and Kaintucks to historic stands and the Civil War, the Natchez Trace Parkway takes you on a journey through 10,000 years of history. Explore the other pages in this section to learn more.
